# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(gfmt LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "/usr/bin/clang")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "/usr/bin/clang++")
add_executable(gfmt "")
set_target_properties(gfmt PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "gfmt")
set_target_properties(gfmt PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/debug")
add_custom_command(OUTPUT output_gfmt_C277A577
    COMMAND echo [  0%]: compiling.module.debug version
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E make_directory ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/src
    COMMAND /usr/bin/clang -Qunused-arguments -m64 -fprebuilt-module-path=build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -fmodules-cache-path=build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -g -O0 -std=c++20 -fuse-ld=lld -fmodules-search-all -fmodules -fbuiltin-module-map -fimplicit-modules -fmodules-cache-path=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -x c++-module --precompile -c ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/version.mpp -o ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache/version.pcm
    COMMAND /usr/bin/clang -Qunused-arguments -m64 -fprebuilt-module-path=build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -fmodules-cache-path=build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -g -O0 -std=c++20 -fuse-ld=lld -fmodules-search-all -fmodules -fbuiltin-module-map -fimplicit-modules -fmodules-cache-path=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -c ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache/version.pcm -o ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/src/version.mpp.o
    COMMAND echo [  0%]: compiling.module.debug cli
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E make_directory ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/src
    COMMAND /usr/bin/clang -Qunused-arguments -m64 -fprebuilt-module-path=build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -fmodules-cache-path=build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -g -O0 -std=c++20 -fuse-ld=lld -fmodules-search-all -fmodules -fbuiltin-module-map -fimplicit-modules -fmodules-cache-path=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -fmodule-file=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache/version.pcm -x c++-module --precompile -c ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/cmd.mpp -o ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache/cli.pcm
    COMMAND /usr/bin/clang -Qunused-arguments -m64 -fprebuilt-module-path=build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -fmodules-cache-path=build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -g -O0 -std=c++20 -fuse-ld=lld -fmodules-search-all -fmodules -fbuiltin-module-map -fimplicit-modules -fmodules-cache-path=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -fmodule-file=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache/version.pcm -c ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache/cli.pcm -o ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/src/cmd.mpp.o
    VERBATIM
)
add_custom_target(target_gfmt_C277A577
    DEPENDS output_gfmt_C277A577
)
add_dependencies(gfmt target_gfmt_C277A577)
target_compile_options(gfmt PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-std=c++20>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fuse-ld=lld>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fmodules-search-all>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fmodules>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fbuiltin-module-map>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fimplicit-modules>
)
set_source_files_properties(${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/main.cpp PROPERTIES COMPILE_OPTIONS
    "$<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fmodule-file=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache/cli.pcm>"
)
set_target_properties(gfmt PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(gfmt PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(gfmt PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(gfmt PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(gfmt PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(gfmt PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET gfmt PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(gfmt PRIVATE
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/src/version.mpp.o
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/src/cmd.mpp.o
)
target_link_options(gfmt PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(gfmt PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)

# target
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "/usr/bin/clang")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "/usr/bin/clang++")
add_executable(gfmt-test "")
set_target_properties(gfmt-test PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "gfmt-test")
set_target_properties(gfmt-test PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/debug")
add_custom_command(OUTPUT output_gfmt-test_D541C04C
    COMMAND echo [  0%]: compiling.module.debug flags
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E make_directory ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/gfmt-test/linux/x86_64/debug/test
    COMMAND /usr/bin/clang -Qunused-arguments -m64 -fprebuilt-module-path=build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -fmodules-cache-path=build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -g -O0 -std=c++20 -fuse-ld=lld -fmodules-search-all -fmodules -fbuiltin-module-map -fimplicit-modules -fmodules-cache-path=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt-test/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -x c++-module --precompile -c ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/test/flags.mpp -o ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt-test/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache/flags.pcm
    COMMAND /usr/bin/clang -Qunused-arguments -m64 -fprebuilt-module-path=build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -fmodules-cache-path=build/.gens/gfmt/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -g -O0 -std=c++20 -fuse-ld=lld -fmodules-search-all -fmodules -fbuiltin-module-map -fimplicit-modules -fmodules-cache-path=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt-test/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache -c ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/gfmt-test/linux/x86_64/debug/rules/modules/cache/flags.pcm -o ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/gfmt-test/linux/x86_64/debug/test/flags.mpp.o
    VERBATIM
)
add_custom_target(target_gfmt-test_D541C04C
    DEPENDS output_gfmt-test_D541C04C
)
add_dependencies(gfmt-test target_gfmt-test_D541C04C)
target_compile_options(gfmt-test PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fuse-ld=lld>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fmodules-search-all>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fmodules>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fbuiltin-module-map>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fimplicit-modules>
)
set_target_properties(gfmt-test PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(gfmt-test PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(gfmt-test PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(gfmt-test PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(gfmt-test PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(gfmt-test PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET gfmt-test PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(gfmt-test PRIVATE
    gtest
)
target_link_libraries(gfmt-test PRIVATE
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/gfmt-test/linux/x86_64/debug/test/flags.mpp.o
)
target_link_options(gfmt-test PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(gfmt-test PRIVATE
    test/test.cpp
)
